meaningMnemonic: There is a <radical>spirit</radical> at your <radical>wedding</radical>. It's there as a <kanji>supplement</kanji> to the guests because not enough people came.
readingMnemonic: Along with the spirits to <kanji>supplement</kanji> your wedding guests, you made everyone carry a <reading>hoe</reading> (ほ). That way no one had to bring a date, they carry a garden hoe as a supplement and no one feels bad about being dateless. Everyone is!
